name: Home?
description:
What is Home? Go on an adventure to find where you gravitate towards and find the perfect home for you!

Made for Global Game Jam 2019.

Credits:

  • Graphics Artist - Raquel Pipa (Rae)
  • Programming - Tiago Gonçalves, Ivo Protásio, Samuel Godinho (Zk')
  • Audio - John Elliott (John Elliott)
